body: Does this "fix" actually allow the last statement in my example (`$query->one()`) to execute without errors?

Can't try it atm, but I doubt it would work. At least `QueryBuilder::quoteTableNames()` does not expect to get `yii\db\Expression` as its first argument (which is passed as the content of `Query::$from`).
I just tested it and as I suspected it does not work. The error happens exactly were I suspected it would - in `QueryBuilder::quoteTableNames()`. This issue needs to be reopened and fixed properly.
